Description: Rim and wall sherd of East Greek pottery plate; inside slipped cream. On top of rim, hook maeanders; at top of wall inside band with traces of added red; to the centre, lotus flower, with red on petal and five tongues; blobs on outside of rim; three bands at top of exterior wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1012)
